title: Where is ROX Tigers and Longzhu icons?
body: Still waiting for ROX Tigers and Longzhu icons.

replies.body: Same.. It's actually really annoying that it hasn't been addded yet. I've been waiting ever since the eSport icons were available. I'd very much like to know when they'll add the ROX Tigers icon.
Seems like rito doesn't want our money!
They should've come out this patch. Guess they'll come next patch.
do u know when is the next patch coming?
